title: Drawing, "Sketches from Colombia: River Craft (Champan), a Woman, Group of Trees, a House", May 1853
markings: Watermark:  Parts of the letters K F
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, at top left: this champan presented a / fine effect at late twilight.  The fogon / or fireplace in the bow of the boat was / in use and a bright flame with the illum- / inated figures gave great life in contrast / to the cool hues of evening.; at top right: fogon; at bottom right: champan.
description: Square view showing at top: a river craft, beside the bank of a river, with two Indians seated on the bow and upon the cover respectively; at lower left a woman shown in profile turned toward the left; at right bottom a house with a fence in front and a palm beside it.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Sketches from Colombia: River Craft (Champan), a Woman, Group of Trees, a House", May 1853.
May 1853. Graphite on gray paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-67.
